name: Toy Letter Swipe To Word
description:
Welcome to Word Toy. Connect toy letters to build words to solve levels and earn coins!

Word Toy FEATURES -
- Total 5060 unique levels
- Epic toy world
- Simple, easy starting
- Levels become more challenge as you proceed your quest

Play Word Toy today and join millions enjoying the latest touch craze!
If you love word games, we're sure you will love this "Word Toy".
